text: Thomas Kenrick Kavanagh (12 December 1923 â€” 26 November 2019) was an Australian Grand Prix motorcycle road racer and racecar driver. He was born in Melbourne. In 1952, Kavanagh became the first Australian to win a motorcycle Grand Prix race when he won the 350cc Ulster Grand Prix. Kavanagh died in Bergamo, Italy on 26 November 2019 at the age of 95. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Melbourne
title: Ken Kavanagh
